tool_description: Workable, recruit people by creating beautiful job posts through an API
name: Workable
title: Workable

api_list.name: /candidates

parameters.name: candidate
parameters.description: Look at the example on the right hand side for all parameters

parameters.name: shortcode
parameters.description: The shortcode is a unique identifier for each jobs and can be seen by invoking  "/jobs"

utterances.utterance: Create a new candidate profile with the name John Doe, email john.doe@example.com, and phone number 123-456-7890 for the job with shortcode 5678 using API key ABC123XYZ.
Add candidate Sarah Smith with email sarah.smith@example.com and resume link http://resume.com/sarah for job shortcode 4321 using API key KEY987654.
Submit candidate Michael Brown with phone 555-123-4567 and skills in Java and Python for job shortcode 8765 with API key MYAPIKEY123.
Register candidate Emily Johnson with email emily.j@example.com and portfolio link http://portfolio.com/emily for job shortcode 3456 using API key APIKEY456.
Create candidate profile for David Lee with email david.lee@example.com and experience 5 years for job shortcode 7890 using API key SECUREKEY789.
Add candidate Anna White with phone 987-654-3210 and certifications in AWS and Azure for job shortcode 2345 with API key TOKEN12345.
Submit candidate Mark Green with email mark.green@example.com and LinkedIn profile http://linkedin.com/in/markgreen for job shortcode 6789 using API key APIKEY999.
Register candidate Lisa Black with skills in marketing and sales and email lisa.black@example.com for job shortcode 1122 with API key KEYAPI1122.
Create candidate John Miller with phone 321-654-9870 and experience 3 years for job shortcode 3344 using API key APIKEY3344.
Add candidate Rachel Adams with email rachel.adams@example.com and resume link http://resume.com/rachel for job shortcode 5566 with API key MYSECRETKEY5566.
